title: Deep Learning for Multimodal Portfolio integrated in Django web application
description: A comprehensive web application built on Django framework, incorporating various deep learning models for prediction and analysis. It serves as a versatile platform for experimenting with and evaluating different types of neural networks including ANN, CNN, VGG16, RNN, LSTM, BiRNN, and GRU.

title: Image Search Model with Deep Learning
description: An advanced image search system using deep learning techniques for content-based image retrieval. The model can analyze image features and find similar images based on visual content, making it perfect for e-commerce, digital asset management, and visual search applications.

title: Nurses Catalyst Platform
description: A comprehensive healthcare platform designed to support nursing professionals with resources, networking opportunities, and professional development tools. The platform facilitates knowledge sharing and community building within the nursing profession.

title: Uruyange - GreenKitchen
description: A platform connecting consumers directly with local farmers to promote healthy living and support local agriculture.

title: TechSky Shop - E-commerce Platform
description: A modern e-commerce platform specializing in technology products. Features include product catalog, shopping cart, secure payment processing, order management, and customer account management with a responsive design.

title: E-commerce API with Django Rest Framework and Stripe Payment Integration
description: A robust backend solution for online stores, enabling seamless management of products, orders, customers, and payments. Built with Django Rest Framework and integrated with Stripe Payment API for secure transactions.

title: Task Management System
description: A comprehensive web application designed to streamline and optimize task organization, delegation, and tracking within teams or individual workflows. Features real-time updates, collaboration tools, and progress tracking.

title: Face Recognition System
description: An innovative software solution designed to identify and verify individuals based on their facial features. Leveraging state-of-the-art deep learning algorithms and computer vision techniques for security systems, access control, and attendance tracking.

title: Data Analysis - COVID-19 Analysis Report
description: A comprehensive data analysis platform providing insights into the global COVID-19 pandemic. Aggregates and analyzes data from various reliable sources to facilitate informed decision-making and track pandemic trends.
